name: Sailor's Punch from Slightly Oliver
description: We love the zesty tang that a healthy dose of lime juice lends to this bourbon-cider punch from Slightly Oliver. Don't skip the bay leaves, they add a wonderful aromatic depth.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: apple slices, lemon slices, lime slices

recipeInstructions.text: To make the spiced syrup, combine water, cinnamon sticks, cloves, and allspice. Bring to a boil, then let rest until cool. Strain.
Mix bourbon, apple cider, spiced syrup, bay leaves, lime juice, and simple syrup in a large punch bowl. Garnish with slices of apple, lemon, and lime.
